sense.def:
A hostage
je nekdo, ki ga je ugrabila neka oseba ali organizacija in ga lahko ta ubije ali rani, če ljudje ne naredijo tistega, kar ugrabitelj ali organizacija zahteva.

seg.quote: An agreement was reached that freed the 52 hostages

sense.def:
To be taken hostage
ali
to be held hostage
pomeni biti ugrabljen in zaprt kot talec.

seg.quote: He had been taken hostage by terrorists.
They are being held hostage until our demands are met.
